title: Course for Improving the Efficiency of Instructional Design Models Using Blended Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Fundamental Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Application of blended teaching methods reflecting post-positivist perspectives, emphasizing practical language use in simulation/VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners can compare characteristics of various instructional design models (ARCS, ADDIE, ASSURE, etc.) and apply them to actual language learning contexts
Learners can improve target language communication skills by over 20% in VR simulation environments using post-positivist instructional approaches
Learners develop creative language expression strategies by completing assignments that integrate project-based and problem-based learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
